name: Quake: Forgotten Sepulcher
summary: Huge and intricately detailed map set in a medieval swampy environment. Loosely based on E1M3. New monsters, new textures, a new soundtrack, another great "sock" map pack. This map pack requires Arcane Dimensions to work (included) and should last an experienced player one hour of playtime.

videos.name: Trailer
